title: 1970 U.S. in Canada District 1941.
subtitle: The eBay list of a quarter that was said to be wrapped in the back of a Canadian coin in 1941 seems real, but money may not appear in anyone's pillows on the couch.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A bunch of quarters in the 1970s are worth a fortune, and mints were also minted on the back of Canadian currency in 1941.
